title: Cedar Creek & Belle Grove National Historical Park: Management
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management             Management         The Historic Vermont Monument, Commemorating the 8th Vermont Regiment NPS  This section of our site addresses park management and planning, our partners, and the park advisory commission. Administrative HQ's & Mail 8693 Valley Pike P.O. Box 700 Middletown, Virginia 22645 phone: 540.868.9176 fax: 540.869-4527  Visitor Contact Station 7712 Main Street. Middletown, Virginia 22645 phone:  540.869-3051  Visitor Information Email: Shannon Moeck, Park Ranger: e-mail us   Learn more about:  Our Staff & Offices Laws & Policies     Â    Our Visitor Contact Station is Open Cedar Creek and Belle Grove NHP has a Visitor Contact Station located at 7712 Main Street, Middletown, VA 22645, that can help orient you to the Park and its Partner Sites. Stop in to find out about the Park, the Partners,information about Self Guided Battlefield Driving Tours, pick up brochures, and to learn about things to do during while visiting the area.
